name: Website Laundry

description: The specialised cleaning service for web
overview:
The specialised cleaning service for web content errors

You visit the website of a business, looking for specific information… Â  In principle, what do you expect from a website you visit? Do you notice spelling, punctuation or grammar mistakes? Are you able to understand the translation, displayed in your own native language? Perhaps the style and wording leave a lot to be desired? What is your instinctive reaction?

We invite you to visit www.websitelaundry.com to learn about mistakes and their consequences.
